wordGroup: gully erosion 冲沟侵蚀；挖深浸蚀；雏谷侵蚀

sentences.en: The bodies of the three climbers were located at the bottom of a steep gully.
sentences.cn: 3名登山者的尸体在一个陡峭的隘谷谷底找到了。

sentences.en: He saw Becky and they had an exhausting good time playing hispy and gully-keeper with a crowd of their schoolmates.
sentences.cn: 他看见了贝基，俩人和一群同学玩起了捉迷藏和“守沟”游戏，玩得痛快极了。

sentences.en: In summer the stream from the gully flows into the Baikal.
sentences.cn: 夏天，溪水从山谷流进贝加尔湖。
